Title: Switch JS Control (Client Side)
Description: Switch JS control is a very light client side library to create switch(es) on web applications or mobile applications.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Switch JS control is a very light client side library to create switch(es) for web applications or mobile applications. Idea was to design a very simple iPhone style of switch control to use it on android and iPhone applications. You will find the design very rough in the attached example. but i hope it might be helpful to some extent, and can be extended/enhanced to make it nice and usable.
